title: What is more worth?
body:
What is more worth to do?
I buy first kata to get skin
I buy first zed to get skin
I buy first yasuo to get skin
Oh and it my new lvl 1  acc.Who wants to play with me ? :3
{{summoner:31}} 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: I'm not exactly sure if you're asking which champion is better or which we think you should buy first? If you're asking personal opinions I'd say go with Katarina as she can be a little easier to pickup for most people, and can be rather strong as well!
